title: 1912 Underwood & Underwood Jeff Tesreau postcard SOLD
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: 1912 Underwood & Underwood Jeff Tesreau postcard SOLD
posts.post_content:
Extremely rare and beautiful postcard series featuring New York Giants and Boston Red Sox players. Clean unused postcard reverse.

SOLD

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/forsale/large/Underwood%20Tesreau.jpg[/IMG]
Awesome card! Surprised it's graded :). Good luck with the sale.
Hoping to attract those Chinese investors. ;)
Add a zero to your price, and then you will get the Chinesse investor 😃.  Great card Jeff.
